remarks: If ` B ` is a scale of ` A ` by ` C ` , then ` A ` is a scale of ` B ` by ` 1 / C ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Mar-2014.)
statement:
ovolsca.1 $e |- ( ph -> A C_ RR ) $.
ovolsca.2 $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR+ ) $.
ovolsca.3 $e |- ( ph -> B = { x e. RR | ( C x. x ) e. A } ) $.
sca2rab $p |- ( ph -> A = { y e. RR | ( ( 1 / C ) x. y ) e. B } ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B y $.
$d C x y $.
$d ph y $.
